maze

类 Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.Maze
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    GraphInterface

    public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphInterface
    Abstract format of the labyrinth, representing it in a two-dimension Array.
    另请参阅:
    GraphInterface

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAllVertices

        public final java.util.ArrayList<VertexInterface> getAllVertices()
        从接口复制的说明: GraphInterface
        Get all the vertexes of the maze.
        指定者:
        getAllVertices 在接口中 GraphInterface
        返回:
        An ArrayList that contains all vertexes.

      • getSuccessors

        public final java.util.ArrayList<VertexInterface> getSuccessors(VertexInterface vertex)
        从接口复制的说明: GraphInterface
        Get the shortest path from a given source to a vertex.
        指定者:
        getSuccessors 在接口中 GraphInterface
        参数:
        vertex - The destination vertex.
        返回:
        The shortest path containing the vertexes one by one in ArrayList format.

      • getWeight

        public final int getWeight(VertexInterface src,
                           VertexInterface dst)
        从接口复制的说明: GraphInterface
        Get the length from the given source point to a destination vertex. Potentially infinity if there is not a way.
        指定者:
        getWeight 在接口中 GraphInterface
        参数:
        src - The given source point.
        dst - The destination point.
        返回:
        The length of the way between them. If infinity, there is no way linking them for the moment.

        public final boolean saveToTextFile(java.lang.String fileAdd)
        Save the abstract format into a file.
        参数:
        fileAdd - File name given.
        返回:
        Result of saving. True if successful, false if failed.
